1: Move blocks B3 and B4 to special area SA1.
2: Move balls B1 and B2 to special area SA1.
3: Move block B3 inside special area SA1.
4: Move balls B1 and B2 to special area SA1, and pick up ball B4.
5: Move ball B1 into the blue special area.
6: Move block B3 inside special area SA1.
7: Move blocks B1 and B4 inside special area SA1.
8: Move block B4 inside special area SA1.
9: Move block B4 to special area SA1.
10: Move ball B5 into special area SA1.
